short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically groups tabs, Limit the number of tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically groups tabs
- Automatically group tabs with the same domain and set matching titles and colors.

Automatically limit tabs num
- Remove tabs when the number exceeds the limit.
